other_experimental_metadata_available: Cells treated with 0.1 mg/ml ampicillin overnigth and then washed in autoclaved seawater. Cells harbour obligate endosymbionts of the species Polynucleobacter necessarius (Betaproteobacteria) ampicillin-resistent.

primary_citation: Vannini C., Petroni G., Verni F. & Rosati G. 2005. Polynucleobacter bacteria in the brackish?water species Euplotes harpa (Ciliata, Hypotrichia). J. Eukaryot. Microbiol., 52(2): 116-122.
